Gain Dragon Leadership Trait
As a ùY[From.Culture.GetName]ù! you can specialise in the shock and fire tactics of the Chinese.
Form the Fulin Empire
Fulin is the name given to the Byzantine Empire by the Chinese. What better way to solidify the ongoing blending of East and West than taking on the name?
All other Empires you hold will be forfeit...
All other Empires you hold will be forfeit...
Declare your empire Daqin
Daqin, the name given to Ancient Rome by the Chinese. If you could control it's territory, you could proclaim yourself the only true equal of the Middle Kingdom...
All other empires you hold, including Fulin, will be destroyed.
Adopt Ancient Roman customs
The Romans were the pinnacle of the West's power and accomplishments. We should not forget their way of life, but add it to our own.
ùYSino-Romanù! culture will begin spreading.
ùYSino-Romanù! culture will begin spreading.
Embrace Sino-Roman culture
The new blend of Roman and Chinese cultures is proving to be most auspicious. Perhaps the time has come to leave your old ways behind?
Delve into the Classics
Our heritage is that of the Classical world. It would do us well to study and understand it.
Go to the Chinese Mound
Investigate the terracotta-filled mound that you found on your trip to China.
Return Home
Damn the excavation! Your realm needs you. \n ùRThis will reset your progress on the dig.ù!
Form the Tyrian Guard
Inspired by the Terracotta Army guarding Qin Shi Huang, create your own personal guard of elite soldiers.
Explore China
Take some time away from court to go explore China.
This option is available because you have the holiday feature disabled.
